export var homeWorkReducer=function homeWorkReducer(state,action){// need to fix any
switch(action.type){case'sort':// by name
return action.payload==='up'?state.sort(function(a,b){if(a.name>b.name){return 1;}else if(a.name<b.name){return-1;}else{return 0;}}):state.sort(function(a,b){if(a.name>b.name){return-1;}else if(a.name<b.name){return 1;}else{return 0;}});case'check':return state.filter(function(el){return el.age>=action.payload;});// need to fix
default:return state;}};
